title: Common shared schema and config [common conf directory] for multicore in non-cloud mode

comments.author: Sarswati Kumar Pandey
comments.content: I want to use common conf directory for my all multicores in Solr 6.3.0, How can i achieve this?

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: JIRA is a wrong forum for these kinds of questions. It is a good question, but ask it at Solr Users mailing list to allow a full discussion to happen. If any specific generic improvement suggestions will come out of that discussion, those can then become improvement/bug/wish JIRAs.
